name: Motor City Rider
description:
Racing, ride your super motor bike with high speed, around highway and nice city highway environment. Very thrilling and relaxing with some more drifting your bike on highway. Just take your dream super motor bike and do your racing.
This is very basic of racing , ride motor circle game
Features:
- Amazing graphics of super motor bike , city highway environment
- Simple controls to control and ride your super motor bike on nice environment of city highway
- Gas, break buttons to race your racing , ride super motor bike
- Swing your device to control your super motor circle steer
- Automatic gear of your racing , ride super motor bike
- Camera button to change your view of racing , ride super motor circle
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8xjnv7JYEkg&feature=youtu.be
